</image>   <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;c2cdd2d0.1502">   <title>7th International Cardiff Conference on Paediatric Palliative Care: Cardiff, 8-10 July 2015 </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;c2cdd2d0.1502</link>   <description> Dear DDB members<br><br>*Apologies for cross-posting*<br><br>Please note that the 7th International Cardiff Conference on Paediatric Palliative Care will take place from 8 \ufffd\ufffd\ufffd 10 July 2015 at Cardiff University, Wales, UK. The call for abstracts has closed but there are still places for attendance. Please click on the following link for more information about the conference and how to register: http://www.icpcn.org/cardiffppc2015/ [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-26T15:10:14+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julie Ellis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;c2cdd2d0.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;3ecb6cd9.1502">   <title>Conference in Leicester, April 16-18th: When is death? </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;3ecb6cd9.1502</link>   <description> Dear DDB members<br><br>Apologies for cross-posting.<br><br>Please find attached a call for papers for an interdisciplinary conference on the question \ufffd\ufffd\ufffdWhen is death?\ufffd\ufffd\ufffd to be held at Leicester in April. Deadline for abstract submissions is the 6th of March.<br><br>With best wishes<br><br>Julie, Erica and Kate   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-13T13:37:32+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julie Ellis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;3ecb6cd9.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;aabee749.1502">   <title>FAMILY TROUBLES: CARE AND CHANGE IN DIVERSE CONTEXTS </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;aabee749.1502</link>   <description> Dear DDB members<br><br>Please find attached a call for papers for the following symposium which is being co-sponsored by the Social Aspects of Death, Dying and Bereavement Study Group.<br><br>FAMILY TROUBLES: CARE AND CHANGE IN DIVERSE CONTEXTS - CALL FOR PAPERS<br>One-day Symposium, 16 September 2015, University of Reading, UK<br><br>Read more at: http://blogs.reading.ac.uk/deathinthefamilyinsenegal/family-troubles-symposium-care-and-change-in-diverse-contexts/ and see attached flyer. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2015-02-12T12:23:03+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julie Ellis</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;aabee749.1502</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;9958e715.1501">   <title>FW: PhD scholarship </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;9958e715.1501</link>   <description> Dear List members<br>We would appreciate it if you would circulate this advert for a 2015 onwards PhD scholarship on Anatomy Units contact with families post body donation among any interested students.<br>best wishes<br>Julie Seymour<br>Trish Green<br><br>Dr J.D.Seymour<br>Senior Lecturer in Medical Sociology<br>Hull York Medical School<br>Cottingham Road<br>Hull HU6 7RX<br>Tel (01482) 464167<br><br>E-mail: Julie.Seymour@hyms.ac.uk   </description>   <dc:date>2015-01-08T15:07:13+00:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Julie Seymour</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;9958e715.1501</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;fab0ac7e.1406">   <title>Call for papers: Death, inequality and social difference </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;fab0ac7e.1406</link>   <description> Hello all<br><br>* Apologies for cross posting *<br><br>The call for papers for the annual symposium of the British Sociological Association 'Social Aspects of Death, Dying and Bereavement' is now open. Held on Friday 14th November, the theme for papers this year is 'Death, Inequality and Social Difference'.<br><br>The deadline for abstracts is 5pm GMT 19th September. Full details can be found here: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-06-25T10:41:41+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Woodthorpe</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;fab0ac7e.1406</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;29025d15.1405">   <title>Vacancy at the University of Bath </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;29025d15.1405</link>   <description> Hello all<br><br>* Apologies for cross-posting *<br><br>The University of Bath is seeking to recruit a lecturer in Sociology in the Department of Social and Policy Sciences, where the Centre for Death and Society is based. If you have ever wanted to work with CDAS then I would recommend that you take a look at the job advert below: [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-05-21T10:27:47+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>Kate Woodthorpe</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;29025d15.1405</dc:identifier> </item>  <item rdf:about="https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;1993d450.1404">   <title>CFP: Death, Inequality and Social Difference DDB </title>   <link>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;1993d450.1404</link>   <description> Hello<br><br>* Apologies for cross posting *<br><br>The call for papers for the annual symposium of the British Sociological<br>Association Study Group 'Social Aspects of Death, Dying and Bereavement'<br>(aka DDB) has just gone live on the BSA website here:<br><br>http://www.britsoc.co.uk/media/66256/DDB_2014_call.pdf<br><br>Held on November 14th, the theme for this year is 'Death, Inequality and<br>Social Difference'. Abstracts of up to 250 words should be sent to<br>BSADDB@gmail.com by 5pm GMT Friday 19th September 2014. [...]   </description>   <dc:date>2014-04-28T09:41:33+01:00</dc:date>   <dc:creator>E. Borgstrom</dc:creator>   <dc:identifier>https://www.jiscmail.ac.uk:443/cgi-bin/webadmin?A2=BSA-DDB;1993d450.1404</dc:identifier> </item>   </rdf:RDF>
